edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.io.coursera.io

Class CourseraDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.cs.lti.discoursedb.io.coursera.io.CourseraDB

  • public class CourseraDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Establishes a JDBC database connection to a coursera database and provides methods to access Coursera data using the POJOs in the model package.
    Author:
    Haitian Gong

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CourseraDB(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String db, java.lang.String usr, java.lang.String pwd)
      Creates a databse access object for accessing coursera data from a MySQL database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object getDbEntity(java.lang.String table, long id)
      Returns a single User/Forum/Thread/Post/Comment object.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getIds(java.lang.String table)
      Returns ids of all entities of a given table in the designated coursera database.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CourseraDB

        public CourseraDB(java.lang.String host,
                  java.lang.String db,
                  java.lang.String usr,
                  java.lang.String pwd)
        Creates a databse access object for accessing coursera data from a MySQL database.
        Parameters:
        host - host of the coursera db
        db - coursera database
        usr - username with read access to the coursera db
        pwd - user password

    • Method Detail

      • getIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getIds(java.lang.String table)
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns ids of all entities of a given table in the designated coursera database. An id in an idlist can be used to query one entity in the corresponding table at a time in a separate PreparedStatement.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of a table in coursera database for example, "thread", "post" or "comment"
        Returns:
        a list of ids for all the entities in the provided table of coursera databse
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getDbEntity

        public java.lang.Object getDbEntity(java.lang.String table,
                                    long id)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a single User/Forum/Thread/Post/Comment object.
        Parameters:
        table - the name of a table in coursera database for example, "thread", "post" or "comment"
        id - the id of an entity in a table for example, id of a forum, thread or post
        Returns:
        a POJO object that is null if the id doesn't exist in the table.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
